relatedBlades.title: Distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) protection
relatedBlades.subtitle: DDoS protection that mitigates the biggest, most advanced attacks
relatedBlades.copy: DDoS attacks can slow or shut down services, but Cloudflare stops them all. With %{NetworkCapacity} of network capacity, Cloudflare has mitigated some of the largest DDoS attacks ever recorded, without slowing down performance for customers.

columnContent.title: Massive network capacity
columnContent.description: Cloudflare has %{NetworkCapacity} of network capacity, which is %{NetworkCapacityLargestDDOS} larger than the biggest DDoS attack ever recorded

columnContent.title: Set up in minutes
columnContent.description: Turning on DDoS protection is as easy as flipping a switch. Under attack? Use our [Under Attack hotline](https://www.cloudflare.com/lp/ppc/ua-hotline/) to get protection in minutes: +1 (888) 99 FLARE.

columnContent.title: 24/7 email & phone support
columnContent.description: Global, 24/7/365 email and emergency phone support (Enterprise plans). Plus on-demand resources, guides, and best practice implementation.

columnContent.title: Eliminate slow performance and downtime
columnContent.description: Whether defending applications, networks, or websites from DDoS, Cloudflare makes you faster and more reliable.

relatedBlades.title: Block attack traffic with a global network
relatedBlades.copy:
We mitigate DDoS attacks from the nearest location in more than %{DataCenterCount} cities around the world, without sending traffic to faraway scrubbing centers. 

Cloudflare protects web applications, TCP/UDP applications, and networks and data centers alike, across OSI layers 3, 4, and 7.

imageAssetFile.altText: How Cloudflare DDoS Protection works - illustration
imageAssetFile.title: How Cloudflare DDoS Protection works - illustration

contentfulAsset.description: How Cloudflare DDoS Protection works - illustration

relatedBlades.description: Learn about five best practices for mitigating DDoS attacks

content.value: "We experienced a marked increase in malicious traffic from what appeared to be well-financed, professional groups, but Cloudflare absorbed the attacks directed towards us. We easily secured our public web infrastructure behind the global network's best-in-class DDoS and zero-day exploit protection."
Head of Cloud and Virtualization Services — Porsche Informatik

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare DDoS protection keeps your services and infrastructure reliable and safe.

columnContent.title: Secure, reliable websites and web apps
columnContent.description: DDoS protection ensures websites and applications remain online and secure, ensuring a positive user experience.

columnContent.title: Secure TCP/UDP applications
columnContent.description: Cloudflare Spectrum protects applications built with any protocols, including custom protocols. Ensure uptime for any box, container, or virtual machine.

columnContent.title: Secure infrastructure
columnContent.description: Protect your network, data centers, and infrastructure against layer 3 and 4 DDoS attacks with Magic Transit.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore more use cases

relatedBlades.description: Protecting organizations worldwide from the latest DDoS attacks

plansList.description: Website DDoS protection is Free in all application services plans, plus much more!

ctaButton.elementName: DDoS Web - Sign Up CTA Button

features.title: Included Free in all Application Service plans, plus Free CDN & Free SSL
Easy set up from the Cloudflare dashboard or API
Optional upgrades: Firewall (WAF), site acceleration, advanced bot mitigation & more

plansList.description: Protect your TCP/UDP applications against DDoS attacks with our pay-as-you-go service.

features.title: Proxy any TCP/UDP traffic through Cloudflare Spectrum
Easy set up from the Cloudflare dashboard or API
Load balance L4 traffic across multiple servers

plansList.description: Protect your network, data centers and infrastructure against DDoS attacks.

features.title: Mitigate most attacks in under 3 seconds
Integrate via BGP routing and GRE encapsulation
Native integration with L7 services (CDN, WAF, Bot Management, etc.)
Support for all IP services (TCP, UDP, IPSec, VoIP, custom protocols)
Five best practices for mitigating DDoS attacks
features.description: Learn how to defend against rapidly evolving distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) threats and address vulnerabilities at every layer.

contentfulAsset.description: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image

features.title: The State of DDoS Threats: Q3 2023 Report
features.description: By analyzing traffic patterns across our global network, we have identified nascent DDoS threats. By understanding these threats early, your organization can prevent attacks from disrupting business operations.

contentfulAsset.description: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image

features.title: DNS and the threat of DDoS
features.description: In recent years, attackers have been able to take down essential services and huge patches of the Internet using large distributed denial-of-service (DDoS) attacks against DNS. Learn how Cloudflare uses its network architecture to mitigate these attacks.

contentfulAsset.description: Resources card - Thin top orange line  - image
